definition: "water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]
to research/to check/to investigate/to examine/to refer to/to look up (e.g. a word in a dictionary)
okara (i.e. soy pulp, a by-product of making soymilk or tofu)
evil elements who have escaped eradication
rosacea (dermatological condition of the face and nose)/brandy nose

sentences.english: Production costs and pollution can be reduced in iron-smelting by means of SAD in small blast furnace.
sentences.chinese: 小高爐使用硫酸渣鍊鐵能降低生產成本，減少污染。

sentences.english: Sprinkling coffee grounds around your garden eliminates cutworms and ants.
sentences.chinese: 將咖啡渣撒在你的花園裏可以消滅夜蛾和螞蟻。

sentences.english: Now we are going to unload the beet pulp pellet overside into the barges.
sentences.chinese: 現在我們要把外檔的甜菜渣卸到駁船上。

sentences.english: Look at that slightly stubbly chin.
sentences.chinese: 看那下巴上精心修過的鬍渣。

sentences.english: Sweet potato residue is the by-product of sweet potato starch process.
sentences.chinese: 紅薯渣爲紅薯澱粉加工過程中的副產物。

sentences.english: Take the vehicle on a short journey, to warm the transmission up to normal operating temperature.
sentences.chinese: 渣車行一段短路程，幫個波箱熱身去到工作溫度。

sentences.english: The coffee grains plug ged up the kitchen drain.
sentences.chinese: 咖啡渣堵塞了廚房的排水道。

sentences.english: A diamond found lying quietly amongst the broken glass of childhood's chattered windows.
sentences.chinese: 愛是靜靜地躺在童年殘窗之玻璃渣中的一粒寶石。

sentences.english: Free CaO is the main factor affecting the distensibility of slag.
sentences.chinese: 遊離氧化鈣是造成轉爐渣膨脹的主要因素。

sentences.english: In this paper, the damage mechanism of Zn leaching cinder volatile kiln lining is studied.
sentences.chinese: 本文對鋅浸出渣揮發窯窯襯破損機理進行了系統研究。

sentences.english: Saponification slag-fly ash can be used in the high fill sections of highway.
sentences.chinese: 皂化渣粉煤灰可以用做橋頭等高填土路段的回填材料。

sentences.english: Based on the above results, factors of copper loss in slag were analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 在此基礎上，進一步分析渣中鋶夾帶損失影響因素。

sentences.english: Will this have any effect on when Blizzard will announce the next Diablo game?
sentences.chinese: 當玻璃渣發佈新的大菠蘿遊戲時，會不會有什麼影響？

sentences.english: The paper indicates the dry distillation concept in the process for treating Zn-Al-Fe slag.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出了在處理鋁鐵鋅渣過程中鋅的乾餾概念。

sentences.english: The critical highness of slag entrapment was gained in tundish.
sentences.chinese: 同時確定了中間包卷渣的臨界高度。

definition: to break down/to break into pieces/fragmentary
negative score/minus (in grades, such as A-)
"green tea bitch", a girl who seems innocent and charming but is actually calculating and manipulative
